resources.string: Press [img src=menu_icon/] on top left corner of the screen to access Settings page and to configure contacts

1. Press [img src=menu_icon/] on top left corner of the screen to access Settings page
 On Settings Page:
 1.1 . Tap [img src=add_contact_icon/] button to add new contacts.
 1.2 . Tap [img src=edit_icon/] button to edit contacts
 1.3 . Tap [img src=delete_contact_icon/] to delete contacts
 2. Tap [img src=home_icon/] and then [img src=call_icon/] to call your emergency contact
 3. Tap [img src=home_icon/] and then [img src=message_icon/] to text your emergency contact
